DOC.brief_summary: Intraoperative intravenous fluid management practice varies greatly anesthesiologist . Postoperative fluid base weight gain associate major morbidity . Postoperative respiratory complication associate increased morbidity , mortality hospital cost . The literature show conflict data regard intraoperative fluid resuscitation volume . No large-scale study focus intraoperative fluid management postoperative respiratory dysfunction . Hypotheses : Primary - Liberal intraoperative fluid resuscitation associate increase risk 30 day mortality Secondary - Liberal intraoperative fluid resuscitation associate increase likelihood postoperative respiratory failure , pulmonary edema , reintubation , atelectasis , acute kidney injury peri-extubation oxygen desaturation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Volume Type Fluid Postoperative Incidence Respiratory Complications Outcome ( CRC-Study )
DOC.criteria: Ages 18 upwards Tracheally intubate begin procedure extubated end procedure Cases subject additional surgery within previous four week Ages 18
